title: "Google invests $300M in AI firm previously funded by Sam Bankman-Fried"
excerpt: "Reports suggest Google has invested $300 million into an artificial intelligence company which previously received over $500 million from Sam Bankman-Fried and his former business partners. The news has Crypto Twitter wondering whether these funds will be used to pay back FTX creditors."
